short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh Stack Overflow Pages when the back or forward navigation buttons are pressed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a frequent user of stackoverflow.com and, you also have noticed that when you press the back button it sometimes takes you to a version of the previous page from weeks prior, then this extension might be just for you.  The extension does one thing and one thing only. It automatically refreshes the browser page when the click the back button only on 
 web addresses that contain stackoverflow.com. That's the offer, take it or leave it.
